Key Match Events: Luka Modrić scored a free-kick goal in the 51st minute to give Croatia a 1-0 victory over Poland.
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Luka Modrić made his 180th appearance for the national team.
Zlatko Dalić made five changes from the starting lineup in Lisbon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Osijek.
Poland beat Scotland 3-2 in their previous match.
